message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it will bring you a lot of value.
Hi Alice, thanks for offering. However, $13,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $6,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $13,000 represents the value this product offers, I could come down to $11,000.  I believe that's a fair offer considering the benefits you'll gain.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $11,000 is closer but still outside my budget. Could we settle at $7,500?
Bob, thanks for your willingness to negotiate. It seems we're getting closer. How about we split the difference and settle at $9,250? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, thanks for coming closer to my budget.  However, I can't go higher than $8,000 for the product.
